sk: 1.1 Recognise and reproduce target language sounds
1.2 Understand meaning in a variety of familiar contexts
1.3 Use appropriate listening strategies in a variety of contexts
sp: 1.1.1 Recognise and reproduce with little or no support a wide range of target language phonemes
1.2.1 Understand with support the main idea of longer simple texts on a range of familiar topics
1.2.2Understand with support specific information and details of longer simple texts on a range of familiar topics
1.2.3 Understand with support longer simple narratives on a range of familiar topics.
1.2.4 Understand q sequence of supported classroom instructions.
1.2.5 Understand a sequence of supported questions.
1.3.1 Guess the meaning of unfamiliar words from clues provided by other known words.
objektif: By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to Recognise and reproduce with little or no support a wide range of target language phonemes correctly.
By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to Recognise and reproduce with little or no support a wide range of target language phonemes with guidance.

aktiviti.text: Teacher displays flashcards to stimulate interest.
Teacher explains the main concept using a mind map on the board.
Group activity: 'Round Table' brainstorming session.
Pupils complete the comprehension worksheet individually.
Singing the goodbye song.

sk: 1.1 Recognise and reproduce target language sounds
1.2 Understand meaning in a variety of familiar contexts
1.3 Use appropriate listening strategies in a variety of contexts
sp: 1.1.1 Recognise and reproduce with little or no support a wide range of target language phonemes
1.2.1 Understand with support the main idea of longer simple texts on a range of familiar topics
1.2.2Understand with support specific information and details of longer simple texts on a range of familiar topics
1.2.3 Understand with support longer simple narratives on a range of familiar topics.
1.2.4 Understand q sequence of supported classroom instructions.
1.2.5 Understand a sequence of supported questions.
1.3.1 Guess the meaning of unfamiliar words from clues provided by other known words.
objektif: By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to Recognise and reproduce with little or no support a wide range of target language phonemes correctly.
By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to Recognise and reproduce with little or no support a wide range of target language phonemes with guidance.

aktiviti.text: Pupils sing an action song related to the theme.
Teacher introduces new vocabulary using picture cards.
Pupils practice dialogue in pairs (Think-Pair-Share).
Pupils construct sentences using the new vocabulary.
Teacher summarizes the lesson key points.

sk: 2.1 Communicate simple information intelligibly
2.2 Use appropriate communication strategies
2.3 Communicate appropriately to a small or large group
sp: 2.1.1 Give detailed information about themselves.
2.1.2 Find out about and describe experiences up to now.
2.1.3 Ask for,give and respond to simple advice.
2.1.4 Ask about and describe future plans.
2.1.5 Describe people,place and objects using suitable statements.
2.2.1 Keep interaction going in short exchanges by asking questions.
2.2.2 Agree a set of basic steps needed to complete short classroom tasks.
2.3.1 Narrate short basic stories and events.
objektif: By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to Give detailed information about themselves. correctly.
By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to Give detailed information about themselves. with guidance.

aktiviti.text: A simple 'Pop Quiz' to recall previous knowledge.
Pupils read the text aloud with correct pronunciation.
Role-play activity based on the given situation.
Teacher conducts a quick quiz to check understanding.
Singing the goodbye song.

sk: 3.1 Recognise words in linear and non-linear texts by using knowledge of sounds of letters
3.2 Understand a variety of linear and non-linear print and digital texts by using appropriate reading strategies
3.3 Read independently for information and enjoyment
sp: 3.1.1 No learning standard. This learning standard has been covered in Year 1 and Year 2.
3.1.2 No learning standard. This learning standard has been covered in Year 1 and Year 2.
3.1.3 No learning standard. This learning standard has been covered in Year 1 and Year 2.
3.1.4 No learning standard. This learning standard has been covered in Year 1 and Year 2.
3.2.1 Understand the main idea of simple texts of two paragraphs or more.
3.2.2 Understand specific information and details of two paragraphs or more.
3.2.3 Guess the meaning of unfamiar words from clues provided by title,topic and other known words.
3.2.4 Use with support familiar print and digital resources to check meaning.
3.3.1 Read and enjoy A2 fiction/non-fiction print and digital texts of interest.
objektif: By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to No learning standard. This learning standard has been covered in Year 1 and Year 2. correctly.
By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to No learning standard. This learning standard has been covered in Year 1 and Year 2. with guidance.

aktiviti.text: Teacher displays flashcards to stimulate interest.
Pupils read the text aloud with correct pronunciation.
Group activity: 'Round Table' brainstorming session.
Teacher conducts a quick quiz to check understanding.
Pupils complete an 'Exit Ticket'.

sk: 4.1 Form letters and words in neat legible print using cursive writing.
4.2 Communicate basic information intelligibly for a range of purposes in print and digital media
4.3 Communicate with appropriate language form and style for a range of purposes in print and digital media
sp: 4.1.1 No learning standard. This learning standard has been covered in Year 1
4.1.2 No learning standard. This learning standard has been covered in Year 1, Year 3 and Year 4
4.2.1 Give detailed information about themselves.
4.2.2 Ask for,give and respond to simple advice.
4.2.3 Narrate factual events and experiences of interest.
4.2.4 Describe people,places and objects using suitable statements.
4.2.5 Connect sentences into one or two coherent paragraphs using basic coordinating conjunctions and reference pronouns.
4.3.1 Use capital letters,full stops,commas in lists and question marks appropriately in independent writing at discourse level.
4.3.2 Spell a range of high frequency words accurately in independent writing.
4.3.3 Produce a plan or draft of one or two paragraphs for a familiar topic and modify this appropriately in response to feedback.
objektif: By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to No learning standard. This learning standard has been covered in Year 1 correctly.
By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to No learning standard. This learning standard has been covered in Year 1 with guidance.

aktiviti.text: Teacher shows a short video clip related to the topic.
Pupils read the text aloud with correct pronunciation.
Pupils work in groups for a 'Gallery Walk' activity.
Pupils construct sentences using the new vocabulary.
Teacher summarizes the lesson key points.

sk: 5.1 Enjoy and appreciate rhymes, poems and songs
5.2 Express personal responses to literary texts
5.3 Express an imaginative response to literary texts
sp: 5.1.1 No learning standard. This learning standard has been covered in Year 1, Year 2 and Year 3
5.1.2 No learning standard. This learning standard has been covered in Year 1, Year 2 and Year 4
5.2.1 Express in simple language why they like or dislike an event, description or character in a text.
5.3.1 Respond imaginatively and intelligibly through creating simple role-plays and simple poems and other imaginative responses as appropriate.
objektif: By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to No learning standard. This learning standard has been covered in Year 1, Year 2 and Year 3 correctly.
By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to No learning standard. This learning standard has been covered in Year 1, Year 2 and Year 3 with guidance.
